person.persName: Littleton Perry (Caldwell co. farmer, pvt. 48th ky mtd inf (usa))

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Nichols Perry in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on September 29, 1846. Father of Frances M. "Fannie" Perry, William W. Perry, John Perry, America Perry, James Perry, and Sarah Perry. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Employed Orlean Nichols as a farmhand in Caldwell County in 1860. Served in the 48th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as private from October 26, 1863 to August 7, 1864. Died at the Battle of Salem, Kentucky, on August 7, 1864.
